thread.title: Facebook tweaks search to shine light on hot topics

title: Facebook tweaks search to shine light on hot topics
text:
Facebook tweaks search to shine light on hot topics 
GMA News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
SAN FRANCISCO - Facebook on Thursday boosted its search capabilities to let people find and dive into conversations about news publicly shared at the leading social network....
